issue.title: [CI][Python] Do not test manylinux1 wheels in Travis CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5962](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5962). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These can be tested via Crossbow either on demand or nightly. Removing these from Travis CI will save 30 minutes of build time resulting in better team productivity

comments.body:
